reviews.review7: I got the product in 3999 rs with a 10% cash back. This is just awesome product with this price. Battery is good, display is good. Camera is more than expectation, just awesome camera quality with selfie flash.
reviews.review6: Good buy for 3999 INR .Good build quality. Nice display and smooth to use. Good for normal user.Good for gaming support almost all type of games.
reviews.review5: I am giving 5 star becoz its awesome deal from Amazon. 10% cash back and 4k.This phone does not support volte but LTE. Camera and call reception is too good. Battery is detachable. Box contains a screen guard too.
reviews.review4: What a excellent product, the price point I gave full points in all perspective,pros 1-display-5,2-design-5,3-software-5,4-ram management -5,5 -additional key-5, totally very good product,cons nothing for price 4k,thanks for reading
reviews.review3: Happy with the purchase. Got it for 3999rs and its worth the penny. The phone is slim to my surprise and is lighter even after putting the battery. Screen is the most attractive part. Viewing angles are good and Colors are vivid. Camera is OK for some occasional shots. Beauty mode works well for the front camera. With good lighting one can get some decent shot on both the cameras. I bought it for my dad and he generally uses it for calls no internet at all and gets about 2 days battery life. With data on it may last for one day. If 4k is ur budget then this is ur phone. And dont expect it to outperform iPhone 8 or OnePlus 5. It performs for what you pay...
reviews.review2: Yes u cant buy any quality product like this at this price so better grab it as fast as u can....Look was awesome...slim...battery is good...camera is also great...voice clarity is awesome...everything is great in this mobile it satisfies u for ur 4k...Have a good day with honor...

reviews.review30: This flagship from honor is a beast! It is superfast in processing and ram management. I am writing its review after 6 months of purchase. It has a good set of cameras for photography. It has an ergonomic design. The fingerprint sensor is the best among any device! Even after 6 months use, this device has not slowed down!
reviews.review9: Pros
reviews.review8: Only one line : This smartphone is the best under 15000rs segment , the camera , performance , audio everything is unmatched , its a near flagship at mid range price with all the intelligent features and looks . The only draw back is that it doesnt have infinity display. The fact that this smartphone can shoot 60 fps video at 1080p and slow motion at 720p speaks for its performance . Gaming is butter smooth.Camera has all the modes , you just name it , the moving picture or live photo mode (apple) , shoot light trail , night mode is awesome , hdr , portrait mode. The low light photography is awesome .There are no camera bumps which is a very rare feature these days and the back is all glass . No youtube channel , no blog will mention honor 8 as the even under the top 10 smartphones under 15000 Rs list. Its completely bizzare , its the best smartphone , beats samsung galaxy s7 in speed test.
reviews.review28: Awesome phone. Comfortable in hand, ui is just great of great its a mixure of ios and android , fast snappy processor, battery backup last for a day easily with moderate using, very vood cameras both but the best part is lot of editing features and modes are given that makes your pics just like these pics taken from a photographer,
reviews.review29: Guys dont hesitate, just grab it
reviews.review26: Fingerprint censer is blazing fast with multifunctions.
reviews.review27: Also liked customisations offered here and there. No leg whatsoever noticed till date.
reviews.review24: Coming from oneplus two... First thing i noticed is the excellent battery life. Has lasted each full day for past two months with one charge.
reviews.review25: Photos are great for stills. Many inbuilt camera effects to play around. Front facing camera is bright and artificial screen flash does help in brigher selfies.
reviews.review22: * No headphones available with the product.
reviews.review23: No noticable flaws with the mobile. Its a good buy for 15K, packed with some heavy features too. People will definitely notice the product as its glass surface is just amazing when light falls on it(Id suggest sapphire blue).
reviews.review20: * Since body is made of glass, phone is very slippery. Make sure you place the phone on a flat surface unless you have purchased a mobile case.
reviews.review21: * Last time when I bought a huawei phone I got a screen guard with it, not this time. Some of the customers got case with the product, I got no Case nor a screen guard.

reviews.review9: Premium looks and feel. Ive bought a Navy Blue set. Nice phone with great bouquet of features. Excellent value for your money. Specs on paper are decent enough and real life performance is even more impressive. Good battery backup despite high resolution display. Phone charges pretty fast with included fast charger. IR blaster is a bonus feature, which is not supported by many phone these days..
reviews.review8: Everything works perfectly. I bought the activity monitor and the case from the HONOR website and pairing is quite simple. Now I can track fitness and sleep very well. The user interface is special considering that I have used ONE PLUS ONE, MICROMAX YUREKA and Samsung phones before. It is simple and intuitive and there are many other new features in the settings which you can activate. No hindrance to any of the apps.
reviews.review7: Only very minor cons are that it is very slippery and that it sometimes get very warm to touch.
reviews.review6: This H8Pro easily beats in all aspects my earlier Nexus 6 bought at 42k which I used for 2 years.
reviews.review5: I have been using this phone for the last 4 months. It is a brilliant phone with absolutely no lag, a full day battery and an excellent camera. Its software is very stable and I ran this phone without a single restart for 100 days after which I accidentally restarted it trying to eject the sim card tray.
reviews.review4: Excellent phone at reasonable price. Specially battery backup and processor speed. The phone is powered with 4000 mAH battery which is amazing. Normal usage for 2 days without charging is quite usual for it. I am using this phone for last 8 days. Moreover, I feel absolutely no heating problem, which is common with many of the existing budget phones in the market. Thanks to Huawei!!!
reviews.review3: One of the Best available Hand set in the Market. I have done a lot of research on the net before ordering this product . I have been using this for the past 2 days. Perfect for day to day use. Very slim, premium Design. Better than few of the models available in range 30-60K. Specs. are excellent . Blindly go for it.
reviews.review13: HONOR 8 PRO is quite sleek, just 6.97mm in thickness, and has curved sides.
reviews.review2: The phone is marvelous as expected got oreo update too. From Camera to performance wise best in class and battery back up is too amazing. Yesterday morning i received this phone and did full charge and after heavy use of watching videos, playing games, downloading movies and upgrading to Oreo i am writing this review at 47% of battery life. Was always a Huawei fan and will always be. Will recommend this to my colleagues too. Forget Vivo, Oppo, MI, Motorola, Nokia and all under 30K just go for 8 Pro blindly
reviews.review14: Surprising is that it has 4000mAh battery into this body.
reviews.review11: Bought this phone during first week of April. I would say that its an average phone. Specs are good. Theres no heating issue. I updated to Oreo and I am not facing heating issue. Camera is good. Sound quality through 3.5mm jack is awesome. But the sound quality through the speaker is worst, you will get to hear tinny sound through speakers.
reviews.review12: Now comes the worst part, the Battery. Even though it has 4000mah, the battery drains very quickly. I get max of 16 hours and I am not happy with it. Theres no software optimisation for battery whatsoever. Some days I get only 12 hours with moderate usage. My main point in buying this phone was its battery but it has disappointed me. This is my daily runner and due to its incapable battery life, I am finding it difficult with this phone. Guys if you are looking at a phone with a better battery life then dont buy this phone. If you buy this phone then you have to buy a power bank to carry along with you all d time. The next bad part is the charging tine. Huawei advertises that it is capable of fast charging but it takes 2.5 hours to charge from 5% to 100%. I dont think this is fast charging. this has slowest fast charging. With an incapable battery that cant last for an entire day, at least Huawei should have provided real fast charging. I am disappointed with Honor 8 pro.
reviews.review10: Highly recommended...
